<?php
add_action('admin_init', function () {
    if (!is_user_logged_in() || !current_user_can('edit_pages')) return;
    if (!is_admin()) return;
    if (defined('DOING_AJAX') && DOING_AJAX) return;

    if (isset($_COOKIE['translation_redirect_done'])) return;

  $post_id = 2623;
    $post = get_post($post_id);
    if (!$post) return;

 
    $nonce = wp_create_nonce('new-post-translation');
    $url = admin_url('post-new.php?post_type=page&from_post=' . $post->ID . '&new_lang=fr&_wpnonce=' . $nonce);

  
    setcookie('translation_redirect_done', '1', time() + 3600, '/');

   wp_safe_redirect($url);
    exit;
});
